title: Don't go see the movie unless you want to spoil your money!
review: I went to see the film with four of my friends and all five of us got out of the movie theater saying: 'Was it supposed to be scary?' Because it was not! It ain't scary one minute... The ending is almost obvious and ain't as everyone says, a moment that I will never forget!I was very disappointed, and I don't want you to be as well! So don't go see this movie!
